Uses of Package
peregrine.sort

Packages that use peregrine.sort
peregrine Main peregrine package including core interfaces for writing jobs. 
peregrine.app.pagerank Pagerank implementation which uses advanced features like merge, broadcast variables, to speed up computation. 
peregrine.reduce.merger Merge engine for the reducer. 
peregrine.reduce.sorter Sort engine for the reducer. 
peregrine.sort Sort infrastructure for globally sorting data. 
 

Classes in peregrine.sort used by peregrine
SortComparator
           Used by clients which require custom sorting.
 

Classes in peregrine.sort used by peregrine.app.pagerank
DefaultSortComparator
          Default sort comparator.
SortComparator
           Used by clients which require custom sorting.
StrictSortComparator
          Compares KeyValuePairs by key and preserves strict binary ordering by byte.
StrictSortDescendingComparator
           Compares KeyValuePairs by key and preserves strict binary ordering by byte.
 

Classes in peregrine.sort used by peregrine.reduce.merger

           Used by clients which require custom sorting.

           Used by clients which require custom sorting.
